data.name: DataPilotFieldGroupInfo
desc: contains the grouping information of a DataPilotField.

items.name: End
lines: specifies the end value for the grouping if HasAutoEnd is set to FALSE.

items.name: GroupBy
lines: specifies the grouping of the date values.

items.name: Groups
lines: specifies the named groups in this field if there are some.

The returned object is an instance of DataPilotFieldGroups . The collection of groups can be modified by inserting, removing, replacing, or renaming single groups or item names in the groups. When writing back this struct containing such a changed collection of groups to the DataPilotField::GroupInfo property, the modified grouping settings are applied at the DataPilot field.

items.name: HasAutoEnd
lines: specifies whether the end value for the grouping is taken automatically from the maximum of the item values.

items.name: HasAutoStart
lines: specifies whether the start value for the grouping is taken automatically from the minimum of the item values.

items.name: HasDateValues
lines: specifies whether date values are grouped by ranges of days.

items.name: SourceField
lines: contains the source DataPilot field grouping is based on.
Will be NULL if this field is not grouped or contains numeric grouping.

items.name: Start
lines: specifies the start value for the grouping if HasAutoStart is set to FALSE.

items.name: Step
lines: specifies the size of the ranges for numeric or day grouping.

Example: With HasAutoStart set to FALSE, Start set to 2, and Step set to 3, the first group will contain all values greater than or equal to 2 and less than 5. The second group will contain all values greater than or equal to 5 and less than 8, and so on.
